text: Pitbull is a 2005 Polish action film directed by Patryk Vega. == Cast == * Marcin Dorociński – Slawomir Desperski "Despero" * Janusz Gajos – Zbigniew Chyb "Benek" * Andrzej Grabowski – Jacek Goc "Gebels" * Rafał Mohr – Krzysztof Magiera "Nielat" * Krzysztof Stroiński – Male nurse * – Włodzimierz Barszczyk "Barszczu" * Weronika Rosati – Dżemma * Ryszard Filipski – Wor == References == == External links == * Category:2005 action films Category:Polish films Category:Polish action films
title: Pitbull (film)
